channel.description: Recent content in KNN on Hana Ziauddin Portfolio

item.title: ML Classifier Models: Fraud Detection
item.description: In this project, a dataset containing credit card transactions is examined with the goal of training and testing a machine learning classifier models: K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN). The objective is to predict which transactions are likely to be fraudulent. After training the model, we will evaluate its performance using a confusion matrix and accuracy metrics. This assessment will help us determine if the model is a suitable choice for accurately identifying fraudulent transactions.
